transcription_telugu: Prachiya na kaalum, Chennai Parisara Prantalu, Sumaru Rinduvela Satsaralanunde Manjula Nivasaniki Anukulanga On Devi. Iprantam, Pallavulu, Cholulu, Pandulu, Marju, Vijaynagra Samraajjala Aadhi Nello on Devi. Mamallapuram, Vanti, Pallavula Nirmichna Kattadalu Udaarana Kusilpalu, Guhala Guudalu, Iprantacherythranu Telijaystunai Vijaynagra Rajya Kalam, Padnalu Guvaseta Abdomunde, Padheheda Vasethabdom Vijaynagra Samraajim Samayano, Iprantani Chenna Patnamga Pilchevaru Chenna Patnam Anaypeiru, Vijaynagra Rajusri Chenna Panaikunipeirununde Vaichindani Vavisthunaru British Kalam, Padheheda Vasethabdom Praromham Padhehara Vandala Muppai Thomidalu, East India Company Kichendana, British Vyaparalu, Francis Day, Onry King, Modalena Varu, Stanikan Aayekudu Damarla Venkata Appayanunde, Chenna Patnamlo Bhumini Lijuga Thiskunaru Padhehara Vandala Debhinaalu Gullo, British Varu, Akkada, Fort Saint George and a Cotanunirmin Charu This Chennaaynagra Abhuru Dikikendra Bindva Indi Madrasu Patnam Anaypeiru Petaru Ipeiru Yelavachindu Gurinci Vyviva Vadana Luhuna This Dagar Luhuna Madraaja Patnam Gramannunde Vachindani Anayukun Taru Angla Varu Palana, Marju Abhivru Dih Padhehendosetabdom Marju, Iravivaetathdom British India Paripalanalu Madras Presidency Ki Pradhanakendraangam Mar Indi Chennaayu, Oka Premukha Vani Javidya Marju Santh Kritika Kendrangayi Yedigindi Madrasu Vyviva Vyviva Vyviva Vandala Yahaphe Yedilos Tapin Chabadindi Daksina Bharthadeisen Loh Vyviva Purogati Ki Balanga Anilichindi Swatantri Anantaram Pandumidvandala Nalaphe Yedil Taru Vata Pandumidvandala Nalaphe Yediloh Bharthadeisen Ki Swatantri Amvachinathar Vata Madras Presidency Tamil Nadu Rastanga Mar Indi Pandumidvandala Arvaitomidiloh Adhikarika Nga Madrasanayu Peru Chennaayga Mar Charu Chennaayu Ippu Desal Lohni Mukhamayana IT Parisma Sinimalu Antek Koliwood Arugya Marju Vyviva Kendrangala Lokati Chennaayu Vyviva Ishalu Chennaayu Daksina Bharthadeisen Pu Kaapuramaina Motati Brittish Abhivru Dihatana Fort Saint George British India Loh British Nirminchinam Motati Kota Mirasu Dar Vyviva Stha Chennaayu Perseparantal Loh Vusvam Vyviva Stha Prathya Kanga Undedi
translation_english:
Ancient times, the Chennai region, has been suitable for human habitation for about two thousand years. This region has been under the rule of the Pallavas, Cholas, Pandyas, and the Vijayanagara Empire. The structures built by the Pallavas, such as Mamallapuram, are examples of excellent sculpture and cave temples that reveal the history of this region.

During the Vijayanagara Empire, from the 14th to the 16th centuries, this region was called Chennaipatnam. It is believed that the name Chennaipatnam came from the Vijayanagara ruler Chennappa Nayakudu. During the British era, in the 17th century, specifically in 1639, the East India Company, under British traders like Francis Day and Henry King, leased land in Chennaipatnam from the local governor Damarla Venkata Appa.

In 1640, the British built Fort Saint George there, and named the city Madraspatnam, establishing it as a center of administration. There are various opinions about the origin of the name Madras. Some say it came from the village of Madraspatnam. During English rule, Madras developed greatly. By the 18th and 19th centuries, it became the main center for British India's administration as the Madras Presidency, and evolved into a major commercial, industrial, and cultural hub. Madras faced water scarcity issues for hundreds of years and was supported with water through various projects.

After independence, in 1947, India gained independence, and the Madras Presidency became the state of Tamil Nadu. In 1969, the official name of Madras was changed to Chennai. Today, Chennai is a leading IT, industrial, film (Kollywood), and healthcare center in the country.

Chennai is the first British development in South India, with Fort Saint George being the first fort built by the British in India. Chennai stands as a testament to the global commercial history of the region and holds a unique place in the history of worldwide commerce.
system_prompt:
You are a professional translator. Translate the following Telugu text into fluent, natural English. Ensure the meaning, tone, and context are preserved. The input corpus might contain a mix of other languages and grammatical errors. Focus on the essence of the content. Do not display any header or footer, only the translated story.

Telugu:
"""Prachiya na kaalum, Chennai Parisara Prantalu, Sumaru Rinduvela Satsaralanunde Manjula Nivasaniki Anukulanga On Devi. Iprantam, Pallavulu, Cholulu, Pandulu, Marju, Vijaynagra Samraajjala Aadhi Nello on Devi. Mamallapuram, Vanti, Pallavula Nirmichna Kattadalu Udaarana Kusilpalu, Guhala Guudalu, Iprantacherythranu Telijaystunai Vijaynagra Rajya Kalam, Padnalu Guvaseta Abdomunde, Padheheda Vasethabdom Vijaynagra Samraajim Samayano, Iprantani Chenna Patnamga Pilchevaru Chenna Patnam Anaypeiru, Vijaynagra Rajusri Chenna Panaikunipeirununde Vaichindani Vavisthunaru British Kalam, Padheheda Vasethabdom Praromham Padhehara Vandala Muppai Thomidalu, East India Company Kichendana, British Vyaparalu, Francis Day, Onry King, Modalena Varu, Stanikan Aayekudu Damarla Venkata Appayanunde, Chenna Patnamlo Bhumini Lijuga Thiskunaru Padhehara Vandala Debhinaalu Gullo, British Varu, Akkada, Fort Saint George and a Cotanunirmin Charu This Chennaaynagra Abhuru Dikikendra Bindva Indi Madrasu Patnam Anaypeiru Petaru Ipeiru Yelavachindu Gurinci Vyviva Vadana Luhuna This Dagar Luhuna Madraaja Patnam Gramannunde Vachindani Anayukun Taru Angla Varu Palana, Marju Abhivru Dih Padhehendosetabdom Marju, Iravivaetathdom British India Paripalanalu Madras Presidency Ki Pradhanakendraangam Mar Indi Chennaayu, Oka Premukha Vani Javidya Marju Santh Kritika Kendrangayi Yedigindi Madrasu Vyviva Vyviva Vyviva Vandala Yahaphe Yedilos Tapin Chabadindi Daksina Bharthadeisen Loh Vyviva Purogati Ki Balanga Anilichindi Swatantri Anantaram Pandumidvandala Nalaphe Yedil Taru Vata Pandumidvandala Nalaphe Yediloh Bharthadeisen Ki Swatantri Amvachinathar Vata Madras Presidency Tamil Nadu Rastanga Mar Indi Pandumidvandala Arvaitomidiloh Adhikarika Nga Madrasanayu Peru Chennaayga Mar Charu Chennaayu Ippu Desal Lohni Mukhamayana IT Parisma Sinimalu Antek Koliwood Arugya Marju Vyviva Kendrangala Lokati Chennaayu Vyviva Ishalu Chennaayu Daksina Bharthadeisen Pu Kaapuramaina Motati Brittish Abhivru Dihatana Fort Saint George British India Loh British Nirminchinam Motati Kota Mirasu Dar Vyviva Stha Chennaayu Perseparantal Loh Vusvam Vyviva Stha Prathya Kanga Undedi"""
